name: Smoked Fish Steak
effect: Restores 8–10% of Max HP and an additional 800–1,200 HP to the selected character.
description: A large fish steak. The steak has been cured and placed on a wooden slat before smoking. Not only does the final product preserve the fish's physical integrity, but it also boasts a unique smoky flavor.

suspicious.effect: Restores 8% of Max HP and an additional 800 HP to the selected character.
suspicious.description: A large fish steak. The acrid scent of smoke triggers an immediate aversion. After taking a reluctant bite, the overpowering saltiness makes it impossible to savor, leaving no choice but to swallow it quickly to avoid waste.

normal.effect: Restores 9% of Max HP and an additional 1,000 HP to the selected character.
normal.description: A large fish steak. The steak has been cured and placed on a wooden slat before smoking. Not only does the final product preserve the fish's physical integrity, but it also boasts a unique smoky flavor.

delicious.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.
delicious.description: A large fish steak. The tender fish dissolves effortlessly on the tongue, combining savory notes with a hint of sweetness, while the smoky fragrance lingers, delivering a perfect finale to this flavorful delight.
